node.title: Oscar-winning actor William Hurt dead at age 71
node.description: Oscar-winning actor William Hurt known for his roles in movies such as Kiss of the Spider Woman and Broadcast News, has died at the age of 71.
node.content:
["Oscar-winning actor William Hurt known for his roles in movies such as Kiss of the Spider Woman and Broadcast News, has died at the age of 71.", "", "
In this file photo taken on 15 January, 2012, William Hurt arrives at the 69th Annual Golden Globe Awards. Photo: AFP
", "He made his debut in the 1980 Ken Russell film Altered States, before going on to appear in Body Heat, Broadcast News, and The Big Chill.", "But it was his role as an imprisoned window dresser in another 1980s classic - Kiss of the Spider Woman - that won him his greatest acclaim, and the Best Actor award.", ""It is with great sadness that the Hurt family mourns the passing of William Hurt, beloved father and Oscar winning actor, on March 13, 2022, one week before his 72nd birthday. He died peacefully, among family, of natural causes. The family requests privacy at this time," the actor's son, Will, posted in a statement obtained by Deadline.", "In 2018, the actor disclosed that he had been diagnosed with terminal prostate cancer which had spread to the bone.", "- Reuters"]
